extDescription.message: Read untranslated document, go away from localized URL.

error_unsupportedURL.description: Action popup error message, when trigger action on pages like chrome:// URLs

error_URLMismatchLocale.message: URL and target Locale setting mismatch
error_URLMismatchLocale.description: Action popup error message, action triggered, but current URL not meet locale setting

error_unknownActionType.description: Mostly internal error, unexpected message received

error_otherError.description: General exception, error message will also be shown after it

error_pathWildMatch.message: Path finding doesn't allow convert from * to '' (empty string) locale
error_pathWildMatch.description: Form validation error in options page, path type rule rejects locale from * to '' (emtpy string), to avoid too generic match

flash_executed.description: Action popup's success message, not likely to be seen because the popup closed when success

options_saveReminder.description: In options page, reminder user to click save button

options_domainRulesHintDomainShortcut_pr.message: Sub-domain can be omitted, for exampe setting
options_domainRulesHintDomainShortcut_pr.description: Hint about sub-domain, this term is prefixed to example 'domain without sub-domain' value

options_domainRulesHintDomainShortcut_po.description: Hint about sub-domain, this term is suffixed to example 'domain without sub-domain' value

options_domainRulesHintLocalesDefination.message: Represents as two parts, the former is the “original locale” of old URL, and the latter is the “destination locale” to be replaced to.

options_domainRulesHintLocalesShortcut_p.description: Hint about from/to locales, this term is prefixed to example 'two-digits' locale value
Hint about from/to locales, this term is suffixed to example 'two-digits' locale value

options_domainRulesHint_separators.description: Hint about from/to locales, this term is in between each expanded (from the two-digits shorthand) examples

options_domainRulesHintLocalesFormer_pre.description: Hint about 'from' locale, this term is prefixed to the 'star' value

options_domainRulesHintLocalesFormer_pos.description: Hint about 'from' locale, this term is suffixed to the 'star' value

options_domainRulesHintLocalesLatterBlan.message: Destination locale accepts blank, means replace old locale to none (remove), will send altered accept-language header, let the server decide which locale is applicable.
When choose find by “path”, does not accept transform from
options_domainRulesHintLocalesLatterBlan.description: Hint about 'to' locale, this term is prefixed to the 'star' value

options_domainRulesHintLocalesLatterBlan.message: to blank, to avoid generate too generic matches.
options_domainRulesHintLocalesLatterBlan.description: Hint about 'to' locale, this term is suffixed to the 'star' value

options_showTransformedCount.message: Show count of auto transformation on toolbar button
